title: Crypto Takes the Stage at Bloomberg Invest Global
itunes:title: Crypto Takes the Stage at Bloomberg Invest Global
description:
Grayscale Investments CEO Michael Sonnenshein and One River Asset Management President Sebastian Bea discuss the volatility and resiliency of cryptocurrencies from the Bloomberg Invest Global conference.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
